article: nato 's southern commander and a group of senior officers will test shipboard capabilities for overseeing a u.n. withdrawal from bosnia during exercises in the mediterranean this week , an alliance spokesman said sunday .
abstract: with bc-yugoslavia nato officers to conduct shipboard test of u.n. withdrawal plan
